MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL33 postcode area of Llanfairfechan affecting properties in Llanerch Road. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2.30PM. Our engineers are on their way to the area to investigate reports of third party damage and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 7PM. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4.30PM on 5th February 2021
